API¶

This part of the documentation covers all available functions for executing some of AccuRev commands.

AccuRev Class¶

class pyaccurev.AccuRev[source]¶

Use this class for getting AccuRev info (host, port, user), connection to server, login/logout commands.

change_root(root)[source]¶

Use this function for moving to the workspace directory

login(username, passwd)[source]¶

Login with your username and password and then execute command using AR.run() method.

Param:username (required)
Param:password (required)
logout()[source]¶

Logout from the system.

run(command, verbose=False)[source]¶

Runs raw AccuRev commands.

AccuRev Workspace¶

class pyaccurev.ARWorkspace(workspace='')[source]¶

A class for working with current workspace or for creating new workspace.

info(*args)[source]¶
change_stream(name)[source]¶
create()[source]¶

Use it for creating of new workspace. Name, location and stream options are required.
